import classNames from 'classnames' function InfosContact({ activePage, setActivePage }) { const inputStyle = 'bg-light-blue rounded-md h-8 outline-blue px-2 py-1 text-grey' const labelStyle = 'font-bold' const handleClick = () => setActivePage(activePage + 1) return (
Informations personnelles
) } export default InfosContact
